summary: The Schedule client fails to infer workflow arguments based on the workflow type during schedule creation and update operations, affecting type safety for scheduling workflows.
userImpact: Users cannot rely on type inference when creating or updating schedules, requiring manual type specifications and reducing code reliability.
rootCause: Schedule client does not properly reference workflow type information when inferring argument types during creation and update operations.
resolutionDetails: Schedule client was updated to properly infer workflow arguments based on the provided workflow type.
keyQuote: Schedule client does not infer args based on workflow type
